meanings.definition: A type of aircraft that uses an unpowered rotor for lift.
meanings.sent1: Gyroplanes are unique aircraft that rely on a spinning rotor for flying.
meanings.sent2: The gyroplanes flew gracefully through the sky, showcasing their rotor technology.
meanings.sent3: The pilot decided to take the gyroplanes for a spin, quite literally!
meanings.sent4: In a world of fixed-wing planes, gyroplanes stand out like spinning dancers in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The sound of gyroplanes overhead always reminds me of giant flying tops.
